column1: Uchi////If anyone asks me what my favorite restaurant in Houston is
column2: I always say Uchi! I've been going for about 4 years now and love that they periodically rotate options on the vegetarian menu. However
column3: there's always the standard items we order: avocado nigiri
column5: uchi salad (extra jalape√±o edamame sauce on the side because it's amazing)
column8: and of course the ever so famous fried milk. There's even a dedicated vegetarian menu for social hour and the service is always great!
